Name: The Rogue Cavern
About the game: Enter a procedurally generated cavern and get as far as you can. Travel through increasingly difficult floors and find items. FEATURING: A procedurally generated level system- no two games are the same! Over 25 unique items to discover and use. Including: Remote control boxing-glove-in-the-boxes Reverse rocks that send you flying backwards when thrown A staff that creates gusts of wind to blow things around Shoes that enable wall jumping Geodes- Find them in the cave and send them back up to the surface. Stop by the geode breakers to find out what's inside! Cards- Equip them to change the way you play the game. Over 50 to collect! Bosses- find the key in the level and bring it to the door. What lurks on the other side?
Meta Title: The Rogue Cavern: Jun 2, 2020, Sean Frett and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on The Rogue Cavern? Check out the release date (Jun 2, 2020), developer insights from Sean Frett, and a complete game summary.
